title: 365 Days of Empowerment Journal
description: 365 Days of Empowerment writing the vision and expanding your mind to win daily! Increasing your motivation and productivity, focusing on your deep sited inner man. Increasing your ability to become more productive in your spiritual life, relationships, family & workplace. Proverbs 13:12 - Hope deferred makes the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life. Meditating daily helps you to focus on areas that you personally must improve. You will see beyond prior short comings, pushing your mind to the next level of productivity. This book will cause enrichment and spiritual enhancement for personal growth and development. These short and powerful daily phases will enhance your entire life, pushing you beyond your limits. Praying your day with priceless faith caption including daily scriptural reading.
author: Perdita M. Meeks
